reviewText: This was more of a love story. Boring till end when he goes on killing spree
Good Movie..I liked it alot and the fighting scenes were action packed.
Terrible movie. Could not finish it.

DVD Review: Pertaining to the WellGo USA version. This is such a pathetic release. Not only is the movie not formatted properly for a widescreen TV but the picture quality is just abysmal. There is ghosting, jagged movement, lines........... UGH!! It's like watching a big lop of s***! And there are occasional subtitle misspellings as well.

Movie Review: ON THE OTHER HAND, the movie would of been great if not for this crappy release.

In Conclusion: Yes, it is unfortunate that I had to buy the BONZAI, PanMedia version to get at least something of descent quality. And though the Bonzai version has the same formatting issue, the picture was a lot better. So thus, -100 stars for the DVD and 4 1/2 stars for Trial Of The Broken Blade.

A great movie, but this is a terrible, non-anamorphic, standard definition transfer.  The company claims this is the print Celestial Pictures gave them, but the region 3 Hong Kong release from a decade ago was anamorphic.  To add insult to injury, WellGo USA listed the dvd as 16X9.
